name: LOW DOG
description:
Relegated to the background no more, play as the unsung hero of all cheesy cop movies: the hot dog guy.

We did not manage to pack everything we wanted in this game jam, but are proud to present you this prototype we made for the jam. We will be back next time!

Code and Design by;

  • https://twitter.com/zuggamasta
  • https://www.instagram.com/zuggamasta/

Pixel Art by the Amazing James McCartney:

  • https://www.twitch.tv/gingrbeard
  • https://twitter.com/GingrBeard
